doc_desc.title: Beck Depression Inventory-II (BDI-II) - Depression Severity Assessment

version_statement.version_notes: Revised version updated for DSM-IV criteria

title_statement.title: Beck Depression Inventory-II (BDI-II) - Depression Severity Assessment

study_info.abstract: The BDI-II is a 21-item self-report measure assessing the severity of depressive symptoms in adolescents and adults. Items are rated on a 4-point scale describing cognitive, emotional, and physical aspects of depression. It is widely used for clinical screening and monitoring treatment response.

instrument_details.validity: Sensitivity 87%, Specificity 93% for major depressive disorder
